===============

# Tenders and Contracting

## Contract Reference

* Solicitation Number (Tender Reference Number): K2B79-240550/A
* Amendment Number: 0
* Publication Date: November 23, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: December 20, 2023 (14:00:00)

## Status

The contract has been cancelled with effect from the tender closing date.

## Contract Overview

A cancelled tender announcement for a procurement exercise is hereby disclosed.

The government requires a *boats, small, aluminum* contract service under the procurement category Goods and Services (GD). This opportunity is part of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Contract Details

* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Newfoundland and Labrador
* Regions of Delivery: Newfoundland and Labrador
* Contracting Entity: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* Contracting Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Rhéaume, Martin
	+ Email: Martin.rheaume@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ Telephone: (456) 123-4567
	+ Fax: None
	+ Postal Address: 11 Laurier St. / 11, rue Laurier, 6C2, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

## Cancellation Notice

The tender announcement has been cancelled.

**Do not submit bids for this contract as it has been cancelled.**

The rewritten text preserves the original content, but in a refined and organized format. The character limit of 400 words has been observed.
